faqs.q: Can minors use the service?
faqs.a: You must be at least 18 years old to use the service. Even if you hold a motorcycle license, you cannot rent under 18.

faqs.q: Can beginners rent?
faqs.a: Yes, beginners are welcome. Our insurance options ensure peace of mind.

faqs.q: Can I rent at any time?
faqs.a: We are closed on Mondays and Thursdays. Rentals and returns are unavailable on those days.

faqs.q: When are your holidays?
faqs.a: Starting Nov 23, 2023 we are closed on Mondays and Thursdays. Rentals, returns and extensions are unavailable on closed days.

faqs.q: Do you have Obon holidays or peak season fees?
faqs.a: We are closed Aug 11-15, 2025. From Aug 6-15 a busy-season surcharge of Â¥550 per day applies.

faqs.q: Can I return the bike outside business hours?
faqs.a: Returns outside business hours (10:00-19:00) are not possible. Please return later; late returns will incur a fee.

faqs.q: About returning after hours
faqs.a: Returns after hours are not allowed. Security is active so please return on another day. Late returns incur a fee.

faqs.q: Do you rent helmets and gloves?
faqs.a: Yes, you can choose them as options after selecting your bike.

faqs.q: Can I rent a helmet?
faqs.a: Helmet rental is available as an option. If not selected, please bring your own.

faqs.q: Do you lend ETC cards?
faqs.a: We do not lend ETC cards. Some bikes may not have ETC equipment.

faqs.q: How do I use the Minowa store?
faqs.a: At the Minowa store, press the intercom on the right side of the Route 4 entrance and our staff will assist you.

faqs.q: Can I return the bike to a different store?
faqs.a: Please return the bike to the store you rented from.

faqs.q: Is parking available if I come by car, bike or bicycle?
faqs.a: We do not keep customers' vehicles.

faqs.q: Can you store my car, bike or bicycle while I rent?
faqs.a: We cannot store any personal vehicles.

faqs.q: What if the bike breaks down during use?
faqs.a: If within 180km of the rental store, free 24-hour roadside service is available. During business hours contact the store; otherwise use the service directly.

faqs.q: Until when can I make a reservation?
faqs.a: Reservations are accepted until 5pm on the business day before your rental.

faqs.q: How do I cancel?
faqs.a: Email info@yasukari.com by 5pm with your name, bike and reservation number.

faqs.q: When do cancellation fees apply?
faqs.a: A fee of 50% of the base rate applies from 3 business days before your rental.

faqs.q: How do I change my reservation date?
faqs.a: Please cancel and rebook. See "01. About Reservations" for details.

faqs.q: How do I extend my rental?
faqs.a: Email info@yasukari.com by 5pm with subject "Extension" including reservation number, name, bike and rental date. Extensions may not always be possible.

faqs.q: Can I make reservations or inquiries by phone?
faqs.a: We do not handle inquiries by phone. Please use our website.

faqs.q: When are email inquiries answered?
faqs.a: Emails are answered 10:00-17:00 on business days. Messages after hours or on closed days will be handled the next business day.

faqs.q: What does the insurance cover?
faqs.a: It includes personal, property and vehicle coverage. See the terms of use for details.

faqs.q: How can I get a copy of the voluntary insurance certificate?
faqs.a: Email info@yasukari.com with subject "Insurance Certificate" including your reservation number, name, bike and rental date.

faqs.q: Have rental rates changed?
faqs.a: Rates have been revised due to rising maintenance and parts costs. See https://yasukari.com/storage/informations/cuhbm1j1qb717lh4v090.png for the new prices.

faqs.q: Do I need anything besides my license?
faqs.a: You may be asked for proof of current address such as a utility bill.

faqs.q: How do I pay?
faqs.a: Payment is in advance by credit card, e-money or other specified method.

faqs.q: Do I have to return the bike with a full tank?
faqs.a: Yes, please return the bike with a full tank. Otherwise we will charge for fuel.

faqs.q: Can I use the bike for long distances?
faqs.a: Yes. Distance limits and extra fees vary by bike and plan, so check in advance.

faqs.q: Is there a mileage limit?
faqs.a: Each bike class has a guideline distance. See the chart for details.
